Fourth Architectural Festival to Be Held 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The 4th May 21 Architectural Festival will be held in Pyongyang from Mar. 23 to 26.
 Prize contests of architectural design of urban-and rural-style dwelling houses and plan design of urban and rural mini-districts to build cities and rural villages into those in a socialist land of bliss and a contest for the modernization of architectural design will be held during the festival on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the Korean Union of Architects.    
 The festival will bring together architectural designers, construction technicians and officials of scientific and educational institutions in the architectural field.
